name: Strun Wraith
description: A different take on a familiar shotgun, the Strun Wraith features unique styling.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U1.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Strun & Strun Wraith reload sounds not playing properly.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.1: Operation Shadow Debt.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Karak Wraith Barrel improperly being named as the Strun Wraith Barrel.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Strun Wraith being unable to equip the Strun Conclave Skin.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some elements of Parkour 2.0 interfering with reload on the Strun and Strun Wraith.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.6.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Strun Wraith and Gorgon weapons not showing the correct Impact / Slash / Puncture stats in the Conclave Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Strun and Strun Wraith making continuous clicking sounds when you hit an empty magazine.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where having a status chance greater than 100% on the Boar Prime and Strun Wraith would cause the UI to display “0”

name: Boar Prime
description: One of the finest examples of Tenno craftsmanship, the Boar Prime offers a higher fire rate, clip size and a much higher per-shot damage.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Boar Prime appearing in ultra rare Loot Crates. It has been replaced with the Scindo Prime Blueprint.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where having a status chance greater than 100% on the Boar Prime and Strun Wraith would cause the UI to display “0”

name: Snipetron Vandal
description: A customized version of the elusive Snipetron, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.3
patchlogs.changes: Snipetron Vandal

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.4.2
patchlogs.fixes: Decreased the damage of the Snipetron Vandal in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.5.0: Edo Armor & Nami Solo
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issue with Shock Camo skin not working on Snipetron Vandal.

name: Braton Vandal
description: A special version of the standard Braton rifle with a slower fire rate but offering higher accuracy and damage values. The Braton Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Updated icons for the Lato and Braton Vandal.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.9.2 + 16.9.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated the firing sound on the Braton Vandal shots.Hotfix 16.9.2.1:

patchlogs.name: Update 16.10.0
patchlogs.changes: The Braton Vandal has received additional tweaks to its audio FX when fired.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.changes: Updated audio FX on the Braton Vandal.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed missing texture on Braton Vandal

name: Latron Prime
description: The ornamental Latron Prime exploits ancient Orokin technology to get a slight damage increase over the standard Latron.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.3
patchlogs.changes: Latron / Latron Wraith / Latron Prime

patchlogs.name: Update 13.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Latron Prime Blueprint missing from the Void.

patchlogs.name: Update 9.5: Operation Arid Fear
patchlogs.changes: Added custom recoil animations for Latron Prime, and Lato.

name: Braton Prime
description: A classic Orokin weapon, Braton Prime features modified damage levels and a larger magazine over the standard model.

name: Latron Wraith
description: The Latron Wraith is a powerful variation of the standard, semi-automatic rifle that features unique styling.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.3
patchlogs.changes: Latron / Latron Wraith / Latron Prime

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Latron Wraith mag size returned to 15 in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crackling noise when firing the Latron Wraith while using Loki’s Invisibility or Ivara’s Prowl.

name: Vectis Prime
description: Once thought destroyed, the newly uncovered Vectis Prime revives Tenno martial traditions.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Vectis skins not properly coloring the clip on the Vectis Prime.

name: Tigris Prime
description: An artifact of exquisite beauty. A weapon of deadly purpose.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.3
patchlogs.changes: Tigris / Tigris Prime / Sancti Tigris

name: Tiberon Prime
description: Art meets ingenuity with this beautifully deadly rifle.

name: Sybaris Prime
description: Sleek and slender, a golden symbol of Tenno perfection.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.6.3
patchlogs.changes: The Sybaris Prime has had it's hip-fire / aim-fire recoil reviewed to have less side-to-side movement.

name: Soma Prime
description: Known for taking down whole squads with its single massive clip, few weapons were as feared as the Prime Soma.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed hitscan weapons like Soma Prime hitting enemies outside of the rift upon deactivation of Limbo’s Stasis.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.7.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Soma Prime not sitting properly on Saryn when holstered.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error that would occur when viewing Soma Prime in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.2
patchlogs.changes: Slightly reduced the damage of Soma and Soma Prime in PvP.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.changes: Slightly reduced Soma Prime audio.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Soma Prime and Vasto Prime not being visible in the Codex.

name: Burston Prime
description: Once thought lost to the ages, attempts to reengineer the Burston Prime never fully replicated this weapon's power and agility.

name: Boltor Prime
description: Fires Orokin designed bolts that are faster and sharper.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.3
patchlogs.changes: Boltor / Boltor Prime

name: Paris Prime
description: Discovered deep inside an ancient Orokin derelict, the Paris Prime increases the kinetic energy of any bolt it fires, dealing more damage than its more common counterpart.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
patchlogs.changes: Lex Prime, Paris Prime, Dakra Prime, Sicarus Prime, and Ankyros Prime have received the PBR treatment!

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Paris Prime having many incorrect stats in the Arsenal, including a Critical Chance of 25% vs the expected 45%.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect materials on Paris Prime and Lex Prime attachments.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Paris/Paris Prime kills not counting towards the ‘Rifleman’ challenge.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the draw radius and shot radius on Paris, Paris Prime, Cernos, and Daikyu. Before, players were able to hear you draw your bow from considerably far away distances that would give away your position.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.7.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Paris Prime and Diakyu sitting strangely on some Warframes.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Paris Prime showing covering up menu options.

name: Cernos Prime
description: A noble bow to hunt hellish beasts.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed numerous projectile weapons (Detron, Drakgoon, Cernos Prime, etc) having incorrect Status Chance calculations.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mods with negative Accuracy not affecting the Cernos Prime’s spread.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the damage of Cernos Prime in Conclave.

name: Vaykor Hek
description: Forged in the fires of rebel struggle, this shotgun is a force for liberation.

name: Rakta Cernos
description: A finely tuned instrument of assassination.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed reload circle turning blue after using a Charge trigger type weapon (Drakgoon, Rakta Cernos, etc). The intended color is white when reloading.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Bow Dryad Skin not applying correctly to the Rakta Cernos.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Rakta Cernos not properly playing its draw charge audio FX.

name: Secura Penta
description: Ruthless and efficient, just like the free-market.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed unintentional DOT from Adhesive Blast on the Ogris, Penta, Secura Penta, and Tonkor.

name: Sancti Tigris
description: Echo nature's violent beauty with this special Tigris.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.3
patchlogs.changes: Tigris / Tigris Prime / Sancti Tigris

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.6.0 + 20.6.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Sancti Tigris Health buff not working for Clients and only lasting 10 seconds in total for the Host.

name: Synoid Simulor
description: Cephalon Suda’s custom issue Simulor was built to satisfy her curiosity.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Synoid Simulor not properly creating a vortex when used with Hall of Mirrors as a Client as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/524634-simulorsynoid-simulor-and-mirage-clones/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.3.1
patchlogs.changes: Slightly adjusted the visual FX on the Synoid Simulor’s vortexes.

name: Telos Boltor
description: Bring down judgement, with this boltor crafted by the Arbiters of Hexis.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.1 - 22.17.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed unintended shell dropping sound on Telos Boltor

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing weapon trails from projectiles created by the Akbolto, Prime Boltor, Telos Boltor, Telos Akbolto, and Twin Gremlins.

name: Gorgon Wraith
description: The Gorgon Wraith is a powerful variant of its precursor that features unique styling.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 20.4.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where the Jackal was dropping Gorgon Wraith Parts. This may or may not be a spoiler for the rewards of the coming Razorback Armada…

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.2.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed lingering issues related to Weapon Inventory slots if users ran the Gorgon Wraith Alert.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.changes: All players that earned a Gorgon Wraith over the recent Survive or DIE event that did not receive an additional weapon slot have received a weapon slot retroactively, regardless if they have kept or sold the weapon.

name: Vulkar Wraith
description: A blood-red variant of this devastating sniper rifle.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.7.2
patchlogs.changes: Lowered the Ammo pool of Vulkar Wraith in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.changes: Made some adjustments to the Vulkar Wraith’s audio FX.

name: Karak Wraith
description: A different take on the Grineer assault rifle, the Karak Wraith features unique styling.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.1: Operation Shadow Debt.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Karak Wraith Barrel improperly being named as the Strun Wraith Barrel.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Karak Wraith clips giving you a surface to parkour off of.

name: Supra Vandal
description: A customized version of the powerful Supra, featuring a metallic finish and Lotus decal.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.1
patchlogs.changes: Supra Vandal is now tradable.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with Supra Vandal’s tinting.

name: Quanta Vandal
description: A customized version of the Quanta, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Quanta Aufeis Skin skin not being applicable to the Quanta or Quanta Vandal.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Quanta and Quanta Vandal projectiles not exploding when shot by a Client.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.4.3 + Credit Reimbursement #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Quanta Vandal not appearing in the player Codex.

name: Dera Vandal
description: A customized version of the Dera, featuring a metallic finish and Lotus decal.

name: Ignis Wraith
description: A blood-red variant of this destructive flamethrower.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.14.0
patchlogs.fixes: Ignis Wraith mag capacity reduced to 40 in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.fixes: Ignis and Ignis Wraith are now usable in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Ignis Wraith Research being available for unqualified clans. Any clans with this will have it removed following a script. 4/20/2017 Update: The Script has been run and 1644 Clans have had the unearned research removed.
